alert.note: Alert for Dutchess; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 2:10PM EST until January 13 at 10:33PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River near Poughkeepsie. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested with the afternoon high tide just below moderate flood stage and will be falling below flood stage by late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Poughkeepsie Flood Stage: 4.2 Observed Stage at Sat 1 pm: 5.9 Forecast: Sat 8 pm 0.5 Sun 2 am 2.2 Sun 8 am -1.2 Sun 2 pm 2.9 Sun 8 pm -0.6 Mon 2 am 0.6 Mon 8 am -2.7 Mon 2 pm 2.6 Mon 8 pm -0.8 Tue 2 am 1.9 Tue 8 am -0.9 &&
